sentences.en: " I have the gaff now, " he said.
sentences.cn: “ 我现在还有那根鱼钩, " 他说.

sentences.en: Can you put a rope into his nose, or pierce through his cheek with a gaff?
sentences.cn: 你岂能以鼻圈穿过它的鼻子, 以钩子刺透它的腮骨?

sentences.en: EX : If you want to succeed in this field, you'll have to stand the gaff.
sentences.cn: 如果你想在这一行成功, 就必须要勇敢的承受磨难.

sentences.en: Give him the gaff. He deserves it.
sentences.cn: 严厉地批评他吧, 他该受批评.

sentences.en: Hanging the gaff down can spill the wind out of the sail.
sentences.cn: 把桅上斜杆放下来可以减少风的阻力.

sentences.en: I can reach him with the gaff and eat him here in comfort. "
sentences.cn: 我可以用鱼钩把它钓过来,在这儿舒舒服服地吃. ”

sentences.en: I can reach it with the gaff and eat it here in comfort.
sentences.cn: 我可以用鱼钩去把它钩过来,坐在这儿舒舒服服地吃掉它.

sentences.en: Shandy Gaff is made with equal parts of beer and ginger ale.
sentences.cn: 这款鸡尾酒的配方是等分的啤酒和干姜汁.

sentences.en: They killed Green because he was about to blow the gaff on their drug dealing.
sentences.cn: 他们杀死了格林,因为他要把他们贩毒的事情说出去.

sentences.en: To hook or land ( a fish ) using a gaff.
sentences.cn: 用鱼叉叉(鱼),用手钩拉 ( 鱼 )

sentences.en: What did you figure to do when you drove overboard with the gaff?
sentences.cn: 你拿着鱼叉跳下水的那会儿,你考虑过该怎么干 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 鱼叉；斜桁；低级娱乐场所
用鱼叉捉；用鱼钩拖上来；欺骗

trans.tran_cn: 大鱼叉，帆船上缘的斜桁，鸡脚上的铁爪，<英俚>低级娱乐场所
trans.tran_en: On a boat, a gaff is a pole which is attached to a mast in order to support a particular kind of sail
